metadata.title: CVE-2024-40941 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: don't read past the mfuart notifcationIn case the firmware sends a notification that claims it has more datathan it has, we will read past that was allocated for the notification.Remove the print of the buffer, we won't see it by default. If needed,we can see the content with tracing.This was reported by KFENCE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
